short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support advanced functionality while working in Applied Epic.
short.fr: Prise en charge de fonctionnalités avancées pour des travaux dans Applied Epic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is intended for internal and development use only. Provides extended browser support for Applied Epic.
